SDGs.evidenceText: This solution will enable educators to create interactive experiences and games in an easy way using VR/AR. The main problem with interactive and immersive educational material is the lack of content and the goal of our solution is to give a platform that is tailorer for the educators and that will enable them to create the content without a steep learning curve.

description: ScioXR is a platform for creating content in VR/AR that is optimized to be used by educators.
name: ScioXR
